# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-monitoring-1.0.0-RC1.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1077/org/openo/sdno/monitoring/ct_monitoring/1.0.0-RC1/ct_monitoring-1.0.0-RC1.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-monitoring-1.0.0-RC1.zip && rm -f sdno-monitoring-1.0.0-RC1.zip
EXPOSE 8610
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1077 > OPENO_VERSION
